Class Peg

  • java.lang.Object
    • GamePiece
      • Peg

  • public class Peg
extends GamePiece
    This class represents a Peg GamePiece on the board, which is used to give the player hints

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Peg(java.lang.String c)
      Constructor initializes color and thisIcon based on the argument.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Accessor method for the icon of the Peg

      Checks to see if the Peg is white
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the color of the Peg

        getColor, matches, setColor

    • Constructor Detail

      • Peg

        public Peg(java.lang.String c)
        Constructor initializes color and thisIcon based on the argument. Any Peg that is not white will have a black Peg icon.
        Parameters:
        c - - color

    • Method Detail

      • isWhite

        public boolean isWhite()
        Checks to see if the Peg is white
        Returns:
        true if the Peg is white; false otherwise
